name: iTour
description:
Instructions:
  •  To view the Information panel, there are several information area that can be seen inside the map 
  • To Toggle the trees and the controllers on and off there are buttons beside the minimap that you can interact with T
  • In using the minimap for the navigation, press the minimap itself to toggle it on and press anywhere to toggle it off 


  • In order to look around the area, drag the faint eye icon on the right side of the screen to be able to look around 


Disclaimer:
  •  The overall model of the universities are not portrayed 100% from the original scale and design. The purpose of this project is to give an overview on what are the things that you can expect from these universities.
  •  For futher information you can visit their social media pages and official websites

MCC:

Official Website: https://mcc.edu.ph/

DHVSU:

Official Website: https://dhvsu.edu.ph/
